name: Word Solitaire
description:
Word game + Solitaire. You need to clear the board by doing 5 letter words.

  •  A-Z       = To form words
  •  CTRL+Z    = UNDO
  •  CTRL+Y    = REDO
  •  RETURN    = Input word
  •  BACKSPACE = Erase letter

(For what ever reason keyboard inputs aren't working with the javascript version. You can download the desktop version to get those to work)
